title: RTO, Rent to to Own! Lease with Option to Purchase
posting_body: ['I am a licensed real estate agent working with Bridge Realty.', 'We help people get into a rental home now, with the option to purchase the property in the future.', '"Try before you buy".', 'You can also simply rent the property for a minimum of 12 months with the option the stay up to 5 years.', 'I work directly with an investment company that does what is called a Lease with the Option to Purchase.', 'More commonly referred to as Rent to Own.', 'They allow you to look at houses that are for sale on the market, you pick out the house!', 'As a Realtor, we will schedule showings, and view homes from Active and available homes on the market.', 'Once you find something you like, the investment company will buy the property, and do a lease with option to purchase with you.', 'We can look at homes within the 7 county metro area.', 'This includes all of the twin cities and surrounding suburbs.', 'All applicants must have a minimum credit score of 620 or higher.', 'A minimum annual household income of $60k or more.', 'You should feel comfortable with rent payments of $2000 or more.', 'There are other restrictions, but this is a great program for people who may not have the best credit, or are relocating to the area and want to rent first.', 'The plan is to rent to home for a period of 2-3 years and then buy it outright from the investment company when you can qualify for a traditional home mortgage.', 'You can also check out our website for more information:', '<URL>', 'Please email your information and phone number and I will get back to you asap.', 'My name is Steve Ersfeld and I work with Bridge Realty.', 'I am a licensed Realtor in the state of MN and WI.', 'You can also call me directly at:', 'show contact info', '.', 'If your property is now listed with a REALTOR or Broker, please disregard this offer, as it is not our intention to solicit the offerings of other REALTORS or Brokers.']
